channel.title: Short Story Scores
channel.description: A biweekly radio show drawing connections between the narratives and themes of my favourite short stories and music! Listen as I attempt to fit a soundtrack to a particular author or anthology each episode.
channel.itunes:summary: A biweekly radio show drawing connections between the narratives and themes of my favourite short stories and music! Listen as I attempt to fit a soundtrack to a particular author or anthology each episode.
channel.itunes:author: Jordan

item.title: Anton Chekhov
item.itunes:subtitle: Discussed Death of a Government Clerk [1883], Heartache [1886], Lady with the Pet Dog [1899]. Some of my other Chekhov favourites are The Bishop and Anna on the Neck! "Do you see circling through? Tha
item.itunes:summary: Discussed Death of a Government Clerk [1883], Heartache [1886], Lady with the Pet Dog [1899]. Some of my other Chekhov favourites are The Bishop and Anna on the Neck! "Do you see circling through? That's how one returns from two." - Adrianne Lenker
item.description: Discussed Death of a Government Clerk [1883], Heartache [1886], Lady with the Pet Dog [1899]. Some of my other Chekhov favourites are The Bishop and Anna on the Neck! "Do you see circling through? That's how one returns from two." - Adrianne Lenker

item.title: Neil Gaiman
item.itunes:subtitle: Discussing Chivalry [1998], We Can Get Them For You Wholesale [1998], and Troll Bridge [1998]. My recommended readings are Snow Glass Apples [1998] and The Goldfish Pool [1998].
item.itunes:summary: Discussing Chivalry [1998], We Can Get Them For You Wholesale [1998], and Troll Bridge [1998]. My recommended readings are Snow Glass Apples [1998] and The Goldfish Pool [1998].
item.description: Discussing Chivalry [1998], We Can Get Them For You Wholesale [1998], and Troll Bridge [1998]. My recommended readings are Snow Glass Apples [1998] and The Goldfish Pool [1998].

item.title: John Cheever
item.itunes:subtitle: Discussing The Enormous Radio [1947], The Swimmer [1961], and The Angel of the Bridge [1961]. Recommendations: The Five-Forty-Eight, The Chimera
item.itunes:summary: Discussing The Enormous Radio [1947], The Swimmer [1961], and The Angel of the Bridge [1961]. Recommendations: The Five-Forty-Eight, The Chimera
